title: Appropriation
context: ยง386-174 Appropriation. So much of the state insurance fund as may be necessary is hereby appropriated and shall, with the approval of the governor, be expended to pay claims found to be due under section 386-171 for services performed under the authorized direction of a public officer or employee. [L 1963, c 116, pt of ยง1; Supp, ยง97-163; HRS ยง386-174]
